message: This proposal divides the money equally, ensuring a fair share for both players. Accept if you agree.
Take it or leave it, I'm not budging!
I propose we divide the money in a 60-40 ratio. This offers a significant portion to Bob while still leaving me with a substantial amount. Please consider accepting this offer.
You're getting desperate, I'm not giving in yet!
I believe a 50-50 split would be fair under these circumstances. It ensures an equal distribution of the remaining funds. Please consider accepting this offer.
You're getting close to nothing, might as well take what's left
Considering the inflation and our position, I suggest a 40-60 split. This offers a more balanced approach, providing a reasonable amount to both parties. Please think about accepting this proposal.
You're almost out of time, take it or leave it, I'm not negotiating further!
I propose a 35-65 split, aiming for a compromise that respects the diminishing value of the remaining funds. Please consider this offer carefully.
You're running out of time, I'm taking most of what's left
Given the situation, I suggest a 40-60 split. This offers a reasonable balance considering the reduced value of the remaining funds. I hope you'll find this offer acceptable.
It's now or never, take the last crumbs or walk away with nothing
